title: GTA 6 Still Confirmed For November With Summer Marketing Blitz Planned
full_text: GTA 6 Still Confirmed For November With Summer Marketing Blitz Planned. Take-Two Interactive seems confident that Rockstar's big open world sequel is arriving later this year The post GTA 6 Still Confirmed For November With Summer Marketing Blitz Planned appeared first on Kotaku.. Rockstar’s parent company, Take-Two Interactive, reconfirmed Grand Theft Auto 6 is set to launch this November during its quarterly earnings report and conference. Take-Two’s CEO even revealed that m… [+1016 chars]
